Name: Elderflower Gin Fizz
Ingredients: 60 ml Hayman's London Dry Gin from freezer
30 ml Thomas Henry Soda Water chilled
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Fizz or Highball (8oz to 10oz) glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon slice wheel and mint sprigs.
FINE STRAIN into chilled glass. (No ice in the glass.)
Garnish with lemon slice and mint sprigs bouquet.
Review: Be sure to use a small capacity (8 to 10oz max) tall glass, or this cocktail will become over-diluted. Due to the lack of ice in the serve, also ensure the soda is well chilled, and preferably use a frozen bottle of gin.
Nutrition: One serving of Elderflower Gin Fizz contains 208 calories
